solution_line_template: Ann had {oatmeal_baked_dozens} dozen oatmeal cookies - {oatmeal_given_dozens} dozen = <<{oatmeal_baked_dozens}-{oatmeal_given_dozens}={oatmeal_left_dozens}>>{oatmeal_left_dozens} dozen oatmeal cookies left.
Ann had {sugar_baked_dozens} dozen sugar cookies - {sugar_given_dozens} dozen = <<{sugar_baked_dozens}-{sugar_given_dozens}={sugar_left_dozens}>>{sugar_left_dozens} dozen sugar cookies left.
Ann had {chocolate_chip_baked_dozens} dozen chocolate chip cookies - {chocolate_chip_given_dozens} dozen = {chocolate_chip_left_dozens} dozen chocolate chip cookies left.

Ann has a total of {oatmeal_left_dozens} + {sugar_left_dozens} + {chocolate_chip_left_dozens} dozen cookies = <<{oatmeal_left_dozens}+{sugar_left_dozens}+{chocolate_chip_left_dozens}={total_dozens_kept}>>{total_dozens_kept} dozen cookies.
{total_dozens_kept} dozen cookies is {total_dozens_kept} *{dozen} cookies = <<{total_dozens_kept}*{dozen}={total_cookies_kept}>>{total_cookies_kept} cookies remaining.
